Detailed Description

vtkDeformationModel object defines a deformation model based on a mesh (vtkPolyData).

This class inherits from vtkModel base class. As it is specified in vtkModel, at least an input mesh should be defined. Optionally a source mesh for synchronization purposes may be defined. An interface based on this class must be implemented to access available deformation models: vtkParticleSpringSystem, vtkExplicitDeformableModel, etc...

void vtkDeformationModel::Init ( ) [virtual]

Initialize the deformation model.

The model has to be initialized in order to be updated. At least one parameter must be previously defined:

  • Input: vtkPolyData object

Reimplemented from vtkModel.

Reimplemented in vtkEDMInterface, and vtkPSSInterface.

void vtkDeformationModel::RemoveAllCollisions ( )

Remove all collisions from the model.

All previously defined collisions are removed from the model. Collision collection object is not deleted.

void vtkDeformationModel::RemoveBoundaryConditions ( ) [virtual]

Remove conditions of the deformation model.

All previously defined conditions are removed from the model. Condition collection object is not deleted.
